column5: I have a friend who is looking for a chart of Lake Nipigon with depths etc. Can anyone tell me if it exists and where I can purchase one?I would appreciate it much.Tks :7
I believe that the lake is uncharted . We have inquired in the past and have been told that .
canadamapsales.com Don't remember if there is a www. in the URL.

I just looked at the Ontario 'charted waters' index at a local map shop today and did not see Lake Nipigon on there. You can call Chaltrek Geological Supplies in Thunder Bay yourself to double check....807-344-8848.Good luck!Tom
Only small portions are charted.......The vast majority is uncharted.
Thanks alot for the tips folks...I will look into some of these, although it doesn't sound to promising.tks again.
